Yousign API v3: 2. Upload a Document (Anchors)
Yousign API v3: 3. Add  a Signer
Yousign API v3: 4. Activate the Signature Request
Yousign API v3: 1. Initiate a Signature Request
Yousign API v3: 2. Upload a Document (Manual Fields)
Yousign API v3: 3. Add  a Signer
Yousign API v3: 4. Activate the Signature Request
Yousign API v3: 1. Initiate a Signature Request
Yousign API v3: 2. Upload a Document (Anchors)
Yousign API v3: 3. Add  a Signer

body.raw:
{
    "info": {
        "first_name": "{{$randomFirstName}}",
        "last_name": "{{$randomLastName}}",
        "email": "signer_{{$randomEmail}}",
        "phone_number": "+33760047242",
        "locale": "fr"
    },
    "signature_level": "electronic_signature",
    "signature_authentication_mode": "otp_sms",
    "fields": [
        {
            "document_id": "{{documentId}}",
            "type": "signature",
            "page": 1,
            "width": 180,
            "x": 400,
            "y": 650
        },
        {
            "document_id": "{{documentId}}",
            "type": "mention",
            "mention": "Signature date: %date%",
            "page": 1,
            "x": 20,
            "y": 700
        },
        {
            "document_id": "{{documentId}}",
            "type": "text",
            "max_length": 100,
            "question": "What is your name?",
            "optional": true,
            "page": 1,
            "x": 20,
            "y": 20
        },
        {
            "document_id": "{{documentId}}",
            "type": "checkbox",
            "name": "Checkbox 1",
            "optional": true,
            "checked": false,
            "page": 1,
            "x": 20,
            "y": 20
        }
    ],
    "redirect_urls": {
        "success": "{{$randomUrl}}/success",
        "error": "{{$randomUrl}}/error"
    }
}

Yousign API v3: Create a Custom Experience

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Custom Experience #{{$randomInt}}",
    "landing_page_disabled": true,
    "side_panel_disabled": false,
    "text_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
    "background_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
    "button_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
    "text_button_color": "{{$randomHexColor}}",
    "disabled_notifications": [
        "approver.expiration_date_reminder",
        "approver.canceled",
        "approver.expiration_date_updated",
        "follower.approved",
        "follower.canceled",
        "follower.completed",
        "follower.expired",
        "follower.rejected",
        "follower.signed",
        "sender.approved",
        "sender.canceled",
        "sender.completed",
        "sender.rejected",
        "sender.signed",
        "signer.expiration_date_reminder",
        "signer.canceled",
        "signer.completed",
        "signer.signed",
        "signer.expiration_date_updated"
    ],
    "email_logo_disabled": true,
    "email_header_text_disabled": false,
    "email_expiration_text_disabled": true,
    "email_footer_signature_disabled": true,
    "redirect_urls": {
        "success": "{{$randomUrl}}/success",
        "error": "{{$randomUrl}}/error"
    }
}
